frontmatter.title: Notes on Policing the Planet - Part 2
Approaches to Dismantling the Global Surveillance Infrastructure
frontmatter.description: If surveillance technology has been proven to be biased and racist, what are some approaches to dismantling the global surveillance apparatus that supports its creation?

frontmatter.title: Notes on Policing the Planet - Part 1
frontmatter.description: An abolitionist society is one rooted in providing for and supporting the self-determination of communities instead of capital

frontmatter.title: Notes on Pedagogy of the Oppressed - Part 1
frontmatter.description: So why do we need a pedagogy of the oppressed? Because everyone deserves to be free and engaged in the process of exploring their own humanity

frontmatter.title: A Reflection on ‘Property Rights vs Human Rights’
frontmatter.description: If ‘essential workers’ perform necessary work, what does the rest of the labor force do and what are they called?
